query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZBST406 ( MANDT, BS406_AYM, BS406_ASQ, BS406_DEP, BS406_RDT, BS406_SEQ, BS406_SIR, BS406_TDT, BS406_GDT, BS406_COA, BS406_AMA, BS406_AMW, BS406_AMT, BS406_RSN, BS406_COB, BS406_AMB, BS406_RAT, BS406_PST, BS406_RMK, BS406_SUC, BS406_CDT, BS406_CID, BS406_UDT, BS406_UID ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #AYM#, #ASQ#, #DEP#, #RDT#, #SEQ#, #SIR#, #TDT#, #GDT#, #COA#, #AMA#, #AMW#, #AMT#, #RSN#, #COB#, #AMB#, #TU2_RATE#, #PST#, #RMK#, #SUC#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, '', '' )
